nodes.text: A speeder bus was a large repulsorlift vehicle used for group transportation. The AppSci SaberCats of the Junior Academy of Applied Sciences on Lothal used a speeder bus for traveling to grav-ball matches.

GoCorp manufactured the Util-313 speeder bus, an eighteen-meter-long air transport designed for traversing through cities that was used by Galactic Republic senators, high-ranking military personnel, and the Jedi Order. With gullwing doors on either side, the shuttle bus was also surrounded by transparisteel windows, allowing passengers a 360-degree view. As a result of the GoCorp airbus being unarmed, the Galactic Senate deployed fighter escorts for buses that carried high-ranking officials on Coruscant to ensure their safety.
